thread.title: Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson UFC 208 scorecard
thread.title_full: Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson UFC 208 scorecard

author: Bryan Tucker
title: Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson UFC 208 scorecard
text:
share NYSAC 
The Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson UFC 208 scorecard reveals how the judges scored the close fight between the two fighters on the main card Saturday night at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn. 
While judge Eric Colon gave the former UFC champion Anderson Silva all three rounds, judges Doug Crosby and Derek Cleary saw it differently. Crosby gave the second and third rounds to Silva, while Cleary gave Silva the first and third rounds. 
Silva won the contest via unanimous decision 30-27, 29-28 x2. How did you score the fight? Latest From Our Partners
